text: Southampton Central railway station is the main train station in Southampton. It is served by First Great Western, South West Trains, CrossCountry & Southern.Butt, R.V.J. (1995). The Directory of Railway Stations, Patrick Stephens Ltd, Sparkford, , p. 214. It has services terminating for Portsmouth and Southsea, Great Malvern, London Waterloo, Newcastle and other services. ==References== Category:Railway stations in England Category:Buildings and structures in Hampshire
title: Southampton Central railway station
